cause.description:
The purple spotted lawn gnome population has been on a steady decline. Due to the increasing amounts of used spam oil being pored into drains that flow into sprinkler systems in Georgetown and Boulder!
or just send money to Kelly or James so they can pay for ridiculously expensive plan tickets. This will cover the travel costs when traveling to Georgetown and Boulder to conduct research.
1. Purple Spotted Lawn Gnomes are our friends
2. We must save this beloved species
3. We must help them reproduce and regenerate!
cause.mission: help the purple spotted lawn gnomes in boulder and georgetown
cause.name: Purple Spotted Lawn Gnomes
